Cédric Beust ♔ schrieb:
>  My follow-up claim is that anyone who says this has never really worked on
> the kind of real-world projects that I (and hundreds of thousands of other
> developers out there) are involved in on a daily basis.
>   
How can you be sure that in those projects it's really not feasible to 
do TDD, in contrast to the developers just not knowing how to make it 
feasible?

Curious, Ilja
